import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Form = () => { //formulario y estado deben de tener los mismos valores const [form,setForm] = useState({ name:"", min_height:"", max_height:"", min_weight:"", max_weight:"", life_span: "", temperaments: "", image:"", }) const [errors, setErrors] = useState({ name:"", min_height:"", max_height:"", min_weight:"", max_weight:"", life_span: "", temperaments: "", image:"", }) const changeHandler = (e) =>{ //e, me dice quien disparo el event const property = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; validate({...form, [property]:value}) //el mismo estado tiene validate y va a la par setForm({...form, [property]:value}) //cambio el estado y cambia el input } const validate = (form) =>{ if( /^[A-Za-z]+/.test(form.name)){ setErrors({...errors, name:""}) }else{ setErrors({...errors, name:"Name error"}) } if(form.name==="") setErrors({...errors, name: "this field can not be blank"}) } const submitHandler= (e)=>{ e.prevetDefault() ///ya no se va la pag ref axios.post("http://localhost:3001/dogs", form)//envio el body (,form) .then(res=>alert(res)) } return (
{errors.name && {errors.name}}
Home
); }; export default Form;
